title: Pick'em
body:
Would it be possible to swap the icon rewards :3 I know i'm extremely unlikely to even get 12 points total, so would it be possible to swap them, i'd rather the poro eating the ball out of all the rewards :3 even the skin, can you please talk to your superiors or something :3 I 
 _༼ つ ◕__◕ ༽つ a poro eating an orb _ヘ(^__^ ヘ)_ most of all
